mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.business_process_id, a.fact_attribute_id, a.calculation_logic, a.indicators_name, a.indicators_des, c.id as fact_id from tb_atomic_indicators a left join tb_fact_attribute b on a.fact_attribute_id = b.id left join tb_fact c on b.fact_id=c.id where a.del_flag=1 and a.id = #{id}
